engChrName: The hell is this...? Am I...in my own head?
engSearchText: The hell is this...? Am I...in my own head?
jpnChrName: コイツは……… 大君……いや“俺自身”の中か………
jpnSearchText:
コイツは………
大君……いや“俺自身”の中か………

engChrName: This must be the haze that's been hanging over me...
engSearchText: This must be the haze that's been hanging over me...
jpnChrName: ガキの頃から感じてた“昏い穴”………
jpnSearchText: ガキの頃から感じてた“昏い穴”………

engChrName: HOW DARE YOU OBSTRUCT OUR DESTINY...
jpnSearchText: ……許サヌ……我ノ使命………阻マント…………

jpnChrName: 黒月（へいゆえ）………銀（いん）………刻ノ……………
jpnSearchText: 黒月（へいゆえ）………銀（いん）………刻ノ……………

engChrName: I can feel your pain—how bad it felt to give your all for Langport just to get stabbed in the back.
engSearchText:
I can feel your pain—how bad it felt to give your all
for Langport just to get stabbed in the back.
jpnChrName: ……“アンタ”も色々あったんだろうな。 煌都を愛し、尽くして、それでも裏切られて……
jpnSearchText:
……“アンタ”も色々あったんだろうな。
煌都を愛し、尽くして、それでも裏切られて……

engChrName: But that doesn't mean I'm about to let you destroy the place I call home.
engSearchText:
But that doesn't mean I'm about to let you destroy the
place I call home.
jpnChrName: だが俺は──今の煌都を アンタに滅ぼさせるわけにはいかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
だが俺は──今の煌都を
アンタに滅ぼさせるわけにはいかねぇ。

engChrName: So let's settle this—one on one!
engSearchText: So let's settle this—one on one!
jpnChrName: ケリを付けようじゃねぇか、一対一（タイマン）でな！！
jpnSearchText: ケリを付けようじゃねぇか、一対一（タイマン）でな！！

engChrName: YOU WILL BE THE NEXT TYRANT...
engSearchText: YOU WILL BE THE NEXT TYRANT...
jpnChrName: あーろん………うぇい…… ……“我”ヲ継ギシ……当代ヨ………
jpnSearchText:
あーろん………うぇい……
……“我”ヲ継ギシ……当代ヨ………

engChrName: ACCEPT YOUR DESTINY AND RULE THIS LAND...!
engSearchText:
ACCEPT YOUR DESTINY AND RULE THIS
LAND...!
jpnChrName: 宿星（サダメ）ヲ受ケ入レ── ──煌都ニ“裁キ”ヲ────！！
jpnSearchText:
宿星（サダメ）ヲ受ケ入レ──
──煌都ニ“裁キ”ヲ────！！

jpnChrName: ッッおおおおおおおおおおッ──！！！
jpnSearchText: ッッおおおおおおおおおおッ──！！！
